text: The KEX Hotel is a hotel slated to open at the intersection of Northeast Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard and Couch Street in Portland, Oregon, United States. Kex is based in Reykjavík, and the Portland location will mark the brand's first hotel outside Iceland. The hotel will feature a Nordic restaurant called Vivian and a rooftop bar called Dóttir. Vivian is slated to open in November 2019, and Dóttir is scheduled to open in 2020. ==References== Category:Hotels in Portland, Oregon Category:Northeast Portland, Oregon
title: KEX Hotel
